remarks: In case the base of the ` UnifSt ` element of the uniform space is the base of its element structure, then ` UnifSt ` does not restrict it further.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Dec-2017.)
statement:
ussval.1 $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
ussval.2 $e |- U = ( UnifSet ` W ) $.
ussid $p |- ( ( B X. B ) = U. U -> U = ( UnifSt ` W ) ) $.
